Articles.Content:
I need mechjeb for planetary phase angle.

I must agree with some MechJeb haters that playing without mechjeb is really cool:D

But it would be helpful, I want to send probe to Duna and MechJeb would be helpful especially the Phase angle display.

I play in Career mode.
so why is is this on the "Add-on and Release and Projects Showcase" form???
It's misposted, and I'm feeling lazy, so closing it
